body_html:
So we only turn on -fPIC for LINK_LOCAL_PROTOBUF case. We can probably turn it on by default for all custom protobuf build. Here is the code:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/cmake/ProtoBuf.cmake#L28-L42
body_text:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/cmake/ProtoBuf.cmake#L28-L42
body:
So we only turn on -fPIC for LINK_LOCAL_PROTOBUF case. We can probably turn it on by default for all custom protobuf build. Here is the code:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/cmake/ProtoBuf.cmake#L28-L42
